resources.string: Welcome to CollegeMate! Keep updated with the latest news and updates, keep track of your profile (determine how much more you can bunk ;) ) and much more using CollegeMate! Welcome, to a better experience!
Developed by Srinath Obla and Shatavarth Cheruvu

Warning: This application is a prototype and is not dynamically functional. The application is currently under development and is not currently affiliated with any institutes/future clients. Do NOT use this application for any reference!
You can log in to this application using your Moodle™ ID and password combination provided by you university!
Do you have a Moodle™ account provided by the college?
Enter your login ID and password!
